content: Being a mother of two teens and knowing their friends, I stay on top of social media. Used to be on FB, got off because it had no functionality. Maybe you have an argument for now with the work force containing an age range of 21–75. These teens I know are 13–16 years old — none of them have FB accts (they all have SnapChat tho) and they are the same ppl that will dominate the social media scene in 2–3 years.
